CREATE TABLE properties (
property TEXT NOT NULL, -- A property
value TEXT -- The value of the property
)

CREATE TABLE actions (
id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
action TEXT, -- The textual name. e.g. ActionConfirmReadyToRun
execution_phase TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'STARTUP', -- The execution phase this action is valid in
payload TEXT, -- Any payload required for action
active BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' -- Is this action active or not?
)

CREATE TABLE phases (
id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
state BOOLEAN DEFAULT '0', -- phase is active or not
execution_phase TEXT NOT NULL, -- Textual name
note TEXT -- Note explaining what this phase is for
)

CREATE TABLE timers (
id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
active BOOLEAN DEFAULT '0', -- Set to 1 if active
action TEXT, -- The name of the action to run after expiry
payload TEXT, -- Any payload required for the action to run after expiry
expiry INTEGER NOT NULL -- The time in epoch seconds this timer expires
)
